org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks
Interface FileBrowser

All Known Subinterfaces:
LogicalFileBrowser
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFileBrowser, BaseLogicalFileBrowser
public interface FileBrowser

Describes an interface for "browsing" file systems on hardware resoruces that are made available by file resources. File browers maintain state about their current location and use a file browser sevice to perform their file browsing tasks.

See Also:
For more information about file resources, For more information file browsing services

createFileLocation

public FileLocation createFileLocation(java.lang.String path)
                                throws FileException
Creates a file location that contains the given path appended to the location of the current resource. Throws a file exception if the given path results in a malformed url.

Parameters:
path - The path on the current resource
Returns:
A file location

FileException

info

public FileLocation info(java.lang.String path)
                  throws FileException
Returns a file location containg info about the associated file object if there exists a file object on the current resource at the given path. If there is no file object at the given path, this method will throw an exception.

Parameters:
path - The path to the file object in question
Returns:
The file location
Throws:
FileException

exists

public boolean exists(java.lang.String path)
Returns true if there exists a file object at the given path on the current resource, false otherwise. This method can be used, for example, to test if a file or directory exists at the given path, and to take some action based on the results.

Parameters:
path - The path on the current resource
Returns:
True if the path results in a valid file location, false otherwise.

makeDirectory

public FileMakeDir makeDirectory(FileLocation loc)
                          throws FileTaskException
